name: Mr. Peanut in Public Domination
description:
Take on the Great Gatsby as Mr. Peanut in this Mega Man styled shooter. Made for GBJAM9

Initially designed for a 3 level mega man style adventure but only got to finish the first fight. Others to come post jam!

CONTROLS:

------------------

KeyboardControllerActionXA or CrossJumpZX or SquareShootArrowsLeft Stick or D-PadMove
